item.description: Hints # Hint shortcode can be used as hint/alerts/notification block. There are 3 colors to choose: info, warning and danger. hint-[info|warning|danger] **Markdown content** Lorem markdownum insigne. Olympo signis Delphis! Retexi Nereius nova develat stringit, frustra Saturnius uteroque inter! Oculis non ritibus Telethusa Example # Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne. Olympo signis Delphis!
